title: I Fratelli Corsaro
overview: In the unique and inimitable setting of the city of Palermo, the Corsaro brothers move. Fabrizio is a black journalist, Roberto is a criminal lawyer: for this reason they often find themselves forced to work on the same case. Impulsive and libertine Fabrizio, precise and calm Roberto, despite the constant bickering, will be able to solve even the most difficult of mysteries.
